    • Constructor Detail

      • Train

        public Train(Loader loadMaster)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        loadMaster - - any object that implements the Loader interface. a null reference results in runtime errors and does not need to be checked.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumCars

        public int getNumCars()
        Getter - Return the number of TrainCars in this Train
        Returns:
        how many TrainCars have been added to this Train

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        Getter - Return the total weight of all cargo in all TrainCars
        Returns:
        total weight of cargo, summed over all TrainCars

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight(int car)
        Getter - Return the weight of all cargo in a particular TrainCar
        Parameters:
        car - car number starting from 0
        Returns:
        weight of TrainCar indicated by car. Return 0 if car number does not exist

      • getContents

        public Item[][] getContents()
        Getter - 2D array of Items that lists all cargo
        Returns:
        2D array of Items contained in each TrainCar. Row index is the car#.

      • getContents

        public Item[] getContents(int car)
        Getter - 1D array of Items that lists all cargo of a particular TrainCar
        Parameters:
        car - car number starting from 0
        Returns:
        1D array of Items contained in the specif TrainCar. If car number does not exist, return null.

      • getTrainCar

        public TrainCar getTrainCar(int car)
        Getter - Return TrainCar reference for specific car #
        Parameters:
        car - car number starting from 0
        Returns:
        reference to the TrainCar instance at car index If car number does not exist, return null.

      • addCars

        public void addCars(int nCars,
                    double maxWeight)
        Add TrainCars to the Train, all with identical capacity
        Parameters:
        nCars - how many to add. Must be positive
        maxWeight - cargo capacity of the TrainCars to be added. Must be nonnegative

        cars are numbered sequentially from 0. The Nth car added has index (N-1). (array ordering). addCars may be invoked any number of times.

      • load

        public int load(Item item)
        load item onto train
        Parameters:
        item - any object that implements Item
        Returns:
        0/1. 0 if it could not load, 1 if it loads. returns 0 if item is null.

        This method uses the Loader to determine which car in which to load an item. The loader might return Loader.NOCAR If a valid car index is returned by the Loader, then this method loads the item into the specific car.

      • load

        public int load(int qty,
                Item item)
        Convenience wrapper method around load
        Parameters:
        qty - number of items to load
        item - any object that implements Item
        Returns:
        number of items successfully loaded [0..qty] returns 0 if item is null
